title: Berik (1993) New Testament (Print) SABDA
description: The Alkitab Bahasa Berik is a Berik translation of the New Testament published in 1993 by The Indonesian Bible Society. Berik is a Papuan language spoken in eastern Papua New Guinea. Speakers are located in four village groups on the Tor River.

language.name: Berik
language.area: Sarmi Regency, Tor Atas subdistrict; Bora Bora, Waf, Doronta, Beu, Togonfo, Dangken, Kondirjan, Somanente, Tenwer, Sewan, Safrontani and Taminambor villages. North coast area along mid and upper Tor River, inland from Sarmi.
